GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reivews/:review_id.description: serves the review with the requested review_id

review.title: Culture a Love of Agriculture With Agricola
review.review_body: You could sum up Agricola with the simple phrase 'Farmyeard Fun' but the mechanics and game play add so much more than that. You'll find yourself torn between breeding pigs, or sowing crops. Its joyeous and rewarding and it makes you think of time spent outside, which is much harder to do these days!

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: increments the vote count of review with the requested review_id

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of all the comments for the requested review

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: create a new comment for the requested review
